column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Our server was also really friendly and talkative. On an side note
column2: I had brought roses inside a vase because I was planning to give them to someone later
column3: but the host accidentally knocked it over and shattered the vase. About twenty minutes later
column4: the host came back with a brand new vase
column5: which was really nice of her. I really appreciated the great customer service here.
